select replace(uuid(), '-', '');
insert organization(id, name, parent_id, position, status, oauth2_client_id) values (#{id},#{name},#{parentId},#{position},#{status},#{oauth2ClientId})
mapper.select: select * from organization where parent_id = #{parentId} and position = #{position};
mapper.update: update organization set status = #{status} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select a.id as 'organId', a.name as 'organName', a.oauth2_client_id as 'oauth2ClientId', b.id as 'authGroupId', b.name as 'authGroupName', c.name as 'authName', c.uri as 'authValue' from organization as a left join authority_group as b on b.organization_id = a.id left join authority as c on c.authority_group_id = b.id where b.id = #{authGroupId};
